author: DJ Sancho
title: I'm Sorry Part 2
text: I'm sorry my baby for everything
For telling you lies and making you cry
I'm sorry baby I'm so so sorry.
Lo siento te amo por todo eso
Por contarte mal y te trate mal
Lo siento, lo siento mi angel
I'm sorry for the times that I left you all alone
You were all by yourself; you were waiting by the phone
I was out doing you wrong
I was always gone
You were right all along I should of been strong
Instead of letting everything get carried away
Fussing and fighting with you like everyday
Telling you things that I know I regret
So hung over the next morning that I seem to forget
The hate and the lies that I told you that night
The pain and the games, calling you all those names
When I was to blame, I was always out with my friends
I was always getting caught loosing your trust again and again
And how do I get you back, I don't know where to began
Cuz all I wanna do is erase your hurt from within
It's a quarter past ten and all I can think about
Is writing I'm sorry over and over again
C'mon
I'm sorry my baby for everything
For telling you lies and making you cry
I'm sorry baby I'm so so sorry.
Lo siento te amo por todo eso
Por contarte mal y te trate mal
Lo siento, lo siento mi angel
Paso las noches pensando en ti
Cuando te fuistes senti incompleto sin ti
Y aora no se si te vas a regresar ia ia ia.
Y aora solo estoy escuchando este silencio
Quiero oir tu voz dime k me ama dime k vas a regresar solo yo siento incompleto por k no esta
Aqui te nesecito en mis brazos para aser me feliz
Estoy llorando en mi cuarto por k no estas aki hii.
Paso las noches pensando en ti
Cuando te fuistes senti incompleto sin ti
Y aora no se si te vas a regresar ia ia ia.
I'm sorry my baby for everything
For telling you lies and making you cry
I'm sorry baby I'm so so sorry.
Lo siento te amo por todo eso
Por contarte mal y te trate mal
Lo siento, lo siento mi angel
There comes a time in your life when you have to swallow your pride
Listen to your heart and do what you're feeling inside
Tell it how you feel no matter what its take.
Don't be a fool like me and don't make the same mistake
When you have someone that loves you
You better treat her like a queen
Cuz when they should leave
Then you don't have a thing
No one to hold at night wit your arm under her pillow
While you hold her so tight and u gotta say good-bye
I'm sorry my baby for everything
For telling you lies and making you cry
I'm sorry baby I'm so so sorry.
Lo siento te amo por todo eso
Por contarte mal y te trate mal
Lo siento, lo siento mi angel
Paso las noches pensando en ti
Cuando te fuistes senti incompleto sin ti
Y aora no se si te vas a regresar ia ia ia.

author: DJ Sancho
title: Para Siempre
text: El dia que te conosi me enamore de ti
Porque eres todo lo que busco en una mujer
Nunca me imagine que podria ser
Ahora que te tengo nunca voy a soltar
Porque eres la unica cosa en mi vida que es verdad
Y ahora estoy poniendo de rodilla
Para preguntarle si quiere ser mia por siempre
Yo quiero estar contigo mi amor
Yo quiero darte todo mi corazon
I wanna be with you for the rest of my life
Just say I do and just be my wife
Yo quiero estar contigo mi amor
Yo quiero darte todo mi corazon
I wanna be with you for the rest of my life
Just say I do and just be my wife
We gone thru the tough times
The thick and the thin
But we in this game
To come out with the win
And together we can be the couple that everybody sees
The one that how long it took for us to be
If they only knew what it took to be this way
They would probably go back in time
To change the date that they Lost that special someone that they loved again
And realize that was much much more to share
I never want to loose you in this life time
So I have to put my foot down cuz ur so one of a kind
I have to do this the old fashion way
Get on one knee and let ur heart hear me say
Yo quiero estar contigo mi amor
Yo quiero darte todo mi corazon
I wanna be with you for the rest of my life
Just say I do and be my wife
Yo quiero estar contigo mi amor
Yo quiero darte todo mi corazon
I wanna be with you for the rest of my life
Just say I do and be my wife
Mi amor te prometo ke voy hacerte fiel
Que voy a estar contigo mi amor para siempre, hasta la muerte
Yo quiero estar contigo mi amor
Yo quiero darte todo mi corazon
I wanna be with you for the rest of my life
Just say I do and be my wife
Yo quiero estar contigo mi amor
Yo quiero darte todo mi corazon
I wanna be with you for the rest of my life
Just say I do and be my wife
Yo quiero estar contigo mi amor
Yo quiero darte todo mi corazon
I wanna be with you for the rest of my life
Just say I do and be my wife
